title: (x) Looking for Edison Swirl SG
content:
hi someone have this font Edison Swirl SG-Regular...please i need this.   
   
 [darkpancher@hotmail.com](mailto:darkpancher@hotmail.com)
author: hotpixel

comments.content:
Dear Evil,   
   
We do not send fonts here, but we can help you find it. You can get the font here at [Myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110526211057/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Edison+Swirl)

[Rick Mueller](http://web.archive.org/web/20110526211057/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/mueller/) also has a [shareware version](http://web.archive.org/web/20110526211057/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/mueller/update_2005.htm) of that typeface (I'm assuming it's a legit digitization and not a knockoff). I've also seen it called Houghton in the Solotype books.

And just to fill out the options for digitizations   
of Houghton ... Scriptorium offers [Potsdam](http://web.archive.org/web/20110526211057/http:/www.fontcraft.com/Merchant2/merchant.mv?Screen=PROD&Store_Code=cdstore&Product_Code=potsdam&Category_Code=calligraphy).
